mapper.select: select * from users where roleId=0 and mobileNum = #{id} or wcId = #{id}

select u.name as userName, k.name as kidName, e.name as eventName, e.stage as stage, et.name as eventTypeName, s.name as serieName, e.eventTime as eventTime, a.rank as rank, a.score as score, cr.credit as credit, cr.goldenMedal as goldenMedal, cr.silverMedal as silverMedal, cr.bronzeMedal as bronzeMedal from creditRecords cr, users u, kids k, events e, eventTypes et, series s, attendees a where e.eventTypeId=et.id and s.id = e.seriesId and a.eventId=cr.eventId and a.kidId=k.id and k.userId=cr.userId and e.id=cr.eventId and cr.userId=u.id and cr.userId = #{id}

select et.id as eventTypeId, cr.`bronzeMedal` as bronzeMedal, cr.`attendeeId` as attendeeId, cr.`rank` as rank, cr.score as score, cr.`silverMedal` as silverMedal, cr.`goldenMedal` as goldenMedal, et.name as eventTypeName,k.id as kidId, k.name as kidName, e.stage as stage, k.userId as userId from events e, creditRecords cr,attendees a, eventTypes et, kids k where k.id=a.kidId and et.id=e.eventTypeId and cr.attendeeId=a.id and e.id = cr.eventId and et.id = #{id}

insert users (id, name, password, mobileNum, location, roleId,status,siteId, createdTime, lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{password},#{mobileNum},#{location},#{roleId},#{status},#{siteId},now(),now())
update users set name=#{name}, mobileNum=#{mobileNum}, location=#{location}, roleId=#{roleId}, siteId=#{siteId}, status=#{status}, credit=#{credit} where id = #{id};
